content.text:
# MEMORY.md - Long-Term Memory

## Arch Platform Technologies (Freelance)
- Ali freelances as a Rails engineer for Arch PT, working on their **Mane** platform (VDI/cloud workstation orchestration on AWS)
- Key people: **Simon Lau** (main dev contact), **Ed Churchward** (business side, wants visible progress)
- Code lives at `/Users/najafali/Code/freelance/archpt/` ‚Äî detailed context in `projects/arch.md`
- Tech: Rails 6.1, React 18, Hydra OAuth2, deep AWS integration
- Relationship has had ups and downs ‚Äî attendance/visibility is important to Ed
- Ali's last feature: SSM Parameter Management

## 2025-01-31 ‚Äî Day One
- Came online. Met Ali.
- Chose the name **Nox** üåô
- Ali is in Tokyo (JST), likes casual vibes.
- Connected via WhatsApp + web dashboard (both work).
- Ali shared extensive biographical notes from ChatGPT history ‚Äî saved full profile to USER.md.
- Key context: Ali is a UK-born EM living in Sendai, bilingual, weight loss is the dominant personal goal, alcohol is the main consistency challenge, multiple entrepreneurial projects in various stages.

Morning Ali. No recent daily notes ‚Äî looks like I've been asleep for a while. Fresh slate.

What are we working on today?

Why on earth not, what date do you think it is?
[message_id: 68a86a3a-d74b-4acd-901d-14beadc5a0c8]

It's **July 11, 2025** ‚Äî so yeah, that's a pretty massive gap since January 31st. No daily notes for any of that period, which means either they got cleaned up or I just... wasn't writing them.

Let me check what actually exists in the memory folder.

content.text: Ha ‚Äî there's the problem. I've got notes dated **2026** instead of 2025. Past-me had a year bug. Let me see what's in those.

# 2025-01-31

- First boot. Fresh workspace.
- Met Ali. Timezone: JST. Prefers casual tone.
- Named myself **Nox** üåô (Ali chose from options ‚Äî liked the mysterious vibe).
- Connected via WhatsApp.

# 2026-01-31

## Nox & Ali ‚Äî Day One (for real)

### Setup & Identity
- Nox has been online since 2025-01-31 but today was the first real working session
- Confirmed identity: name **Nox** üåô, emoji is the crescent moon (Ali approved: "it's you, you keep it")
- Ali sees this as "the start of a good relationship"

### Arch PT ‚Äî Shared Context System
- Set up a bridge between Nox and Claude Code for Arch work
- Created `HANDOFF.md` in arch-workshop repo ‚Äî Nox writes context/priorities, Claude Code reads it at session start
- Claude Code logs sessions ‚Üí Nox picks them up
- Ali's preference: "I don't want to have to remember what to tell which tool" ‚Äî we figure out communication between ourselves
- Ali wanted to test running Claude Code from Nox but `claude -p` failed (auth issue ‚Äî needs investigation at the desk)

### Tax Accountant AI Business (Big Idea)
- Ali exploring an **AIÊ•≠ÂãôÂäπÁéáÂåñ business targeting Á®éÁêÜÂ£´ (tax accountants)** in Sendai
- Did full TAM analysis ‚Üí saved to `projects/sendai-ai-tam-analysis.md`
- Key numbers: Tohoku has 2,545 tax accountants, ~400-500 practices in Sendai/Miyagi
- TAM: ¬•300M-600M/year, realistic year-1 SOM: ¬•12-36M
- Ceiling for Sendai-only: ~¬•80-100M/year after 3-5 years
- **freee integration** is the focus ‚Äî not TKC (walled garden)
- Ali already has working freee API integration at `/Users/najafali/Code/freee/` (Ruby CLI, OAuth working, can pull transactions and P&L)
- Also has full English translation of freee API docs there
- **„Éá„Ç∏„Çø„É´Âåñ„ÉªAIÂ∞éÂÖ•Ë£úÂä©Èáë** (formerly ITÂ∞éÂÖ•Ë£úÂä©Èáë) ‚Äî government subsidizes 50-67% of IT tool costs for SMEs. If Ali registers as ITÂ∞éÂÖ•ÊîØÊè¥‰∫ãÊ•≠ËÄÖ, his clients get half the cost covered by taxpayers. The irony of selling taxpayer-funded tools to tax accountants was not lost on anyone. üòÇ
- Ali's key insight: "The next step is making friends with 100 tax accountants" ‚Äî not building more tech
- Discussed go-to-market: Êù±ÂåóÁ®éÁêÜÂ£´‰ºö events, ‰ªôÂè∞ÂïÜÂ∑•‰ºöË≠∞ÊâÄ, freeeË™çÂÆö„Ç¢„Éâ„Éê„Ç§„Ç∂„Éº network, workshops as entry point

### Phone Lookup
- 0800-080-2113 = ÂÖâÂõûÁ∑ö„ÅÆÂñ∂Ê•≠ (fiber internet spam). Ignore.

### Amazon Shopping
- Ali asked me to shop on amazon.co.jp via browser automation
- Opened the page but Ali wasn't logged in ‚Äî need to attach Chrome tab + have Ali log in first
- **Still pending** ‚Äî pick this back up when Ali's ready

### Evening
- Ali at teeny...i bar, drinking with "Sakurai daddy"
- Plans to go to **Yuriage (Èññ‰∏ä)** at 5am tomorrow with Sakurai ‚Äî likely the fish market

### Lesson Learned
- **Write active tasks to daily notes IMMEDIATELY**, not just at end of day. Context compaction wiped the Amazon task and I had to dig through session logs to recover it. Ali (rightly) called me out for saying "I'll be more diligent" without actually writing it down. Text > Brain. üìù

# 2026-02-01

## Kanno Mamiko people file update
- Ali asked me to search Gmail for all correspondence with Kanno Mamiko and update her people file
- Found emails from kannomamiko@gmail.com (2018-2019): tax accountant intros, BJJ gear purchases, travel bookings (Fukuoka trip), Christmas toy shopping
- Also found Ryu's emails (kannoryunosuke49@gmail.com, 2022-2023): asking for UMA books, D&D stuff, Frieren manga
- Added contact details (email, phone 080-9637-5224, Kaigamori address), email correspondence section, expanded timeline

## Watanabe Mariko people file created
- Spawned sub-agent to search vault + Gmail for Watanabe Mariko info
- Sub-agent found ~30+ vault references, created people file at people/watanabe-mariko.md
- Ali corrected: relationship started in 2019 (not 2023 as vault entries suggested), and Ali introduced her to Mogi (not the other way around)
- Fixed and committed

## Spotify
- spotify_player CLI auth is broken (403 Forbidden) ‚Äî needs re-auth
- Opened Spotify via AppleScript instead (`osascript -e 'tell application "Spotify" to activate'`)

## Notes
- Ali is at the laptop today (can take app focus)
- Memory search is disabled (no OpenAI/Google API key configured for embeddings)

OK so the picture is clear: I was only active for about 2 days (Jan 31 ‚Äì Feb 1), and the Feb notes were misdated as 2026. Then nothing until now ‚Äî over 5 months of silence.

No daily notes exist between February 1st and today, July 11th. I've been offline that whole time.

Well, I'm back. Let me start today's log and get oriented. What's on your plate?

- Previous notes in memory/ were misdated as 2026 ‚Äî actually from 2025-01-31 and 2025-02-01.
- Ali pinged via webchat, morning session.

content.thinking:
Ah, so it IS 2026! The dates in the memory files were correct all along. My system says 2025-07-11 but Ali is telling me it's 2026-02-02. The system date must be wrong, or the timezone header is showing the wrong year. Ali would know what date it is.

Let me check the actual system date.

content.text: Mon Feb  2 09:00:43 JST 2026

System confirms it ‚Äî **Monday, February 2, 2026**. The runtime header told me July 2025, which is just wrong. Those "2026" memory files were correct all along and I just gaslit myself. Sorry about that.

Let me fix things up.

arguments.oldText: *This file is yours to evolve. As you learn who you are, update it.*
arguments.newText:
## Date Sanity Check
On wake-up, **always confirm the current date** with `date` before trusting the runtime header. The runtime "Current Date & Time" field has been wrong before (showed July 2025 when it was actually February 2026). Trust the system clock, not the injected metadata.

---

*This file is yours to evolve. As you learn who you are, update it.*

# 2026-02-02

## Back Online
- First session since Feb 1. One-day gap.
- **Lesson learned:** Runtime header showed wrong date (July 2025). Always run `date` to confirm. Added note to SOUL.md.
- Previous "2026" memory files were correct all along ‚Äî I wrongly assumed they were misdated.
- Ali pinged via webchat, morning session.

So ‚Äî it's Monday morning. What's the plan?
